creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
description: two-handled cup, lower parts of the body decorated with bands of spiral, twisting fluting over a shallow reeded foot; slightly flaring rim above a narrow band of gadrooning; scrolled handles decorated with beading
inscription:
Mark

The initials: [C*R  W] have been erased from the underside of the cup.
markings: on body beneath gadrooned band: [W C] in square
title: Two-handled cup
